channel.title: [508]-How do you add the 508 D Claw spec? (like in z508 or something)-[508]
channel.description:
Ok, i've been wondering how to add the d claw spec to 508. Not like a 525 D claw spec but like the tipical 508 d claw special. When I d claw special on my server the emote for it is liek going through a tunnel, idk why. if you cna help me post pls. I am very new to coding.
Oh and also, i need to no how to boost up the hits of my weapons on ym server. like ags for example, the max for it is like 36. if ya cna help with any of this pls reply.

item.title: [508]-How do you add the 508 D Claw spec? (like in z508 or something)-[508]
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

For the commands you don’t need to make it, you just reset server, like if its on turn it off and on and your set. But I wouldn’t suggest going to high like 170 is high! combined with like bandos furys ect. but like 150 or so. Then if you want make its attack better chance of hit change the slash bonus. Same thing go to items and search Armadyl_godsword then change the 132 which is next to 80, change 132 to like 200. It will hit more often and since you change the stre bonus it hit higher. Then exit your source if its running and restart it, you don’t have to restart your client. So if your updating just exit it and run it then wala!!! =D hope this help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2009, 07:43:44 pm[/size][hr]You don’t need to make any commands for that unless you want like a ring that makes u hit more or something

Read full topic

item.title: [508]-How do you add the 508 D Claw spec? (like in z508 or something)-[508]
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

not sure about the dclaws 1, but ags one u can make the stre bonus more, so u hit like 60-70 when spec and like 50 normal, go to your source, go to bin, then go to data. Once at data go to items. Click on items with outlook express symbol and open with wordpad. Once open click ctrl-F and search Armadyl_godsword, make the 131 to 170 or something
